title: The Family Man
episode_desc: Middle-class man working for the National Investigation Agency. While he tries to protect the nation from terrorists, he also has to protect his family from the impact of his secretive, high-pressure, and low paying job.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Sleepers
episode_desc: A scooter bomb goes off at Kala Ghoda. Srikant learns about a mission called Zulfiqar. Suspects in the blast case tell him about a drop box near Victoria College. He arranges for round-the-clock surveillance at the drop box location.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Anti-National
episode_desc: When he finds out that one of the hospitalised prisoners is part of Mission Zulfiqar, Srikant interrogates the prisoner's friend, Moosa, about it. Someone called Kareem has used the dropbox. TASC monitors Kareem's hostel room, but Kareem gives them the slip.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Patriots
episode_desc: TASC is in a quandary. They fear Kareem and his men have a devious plan. They get to Kareem's car, only to realise that things are not what they seem.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Pariah
episode_desc: ISI agent Sameer sends the Kala Ghoda bomber to Kashmir to execute Mission Zulfiqar. Srikant is 'punished' and sent to Kashmir, but when his boss, Kulkarni, tells him it was planned, Srikant starts digging into Zulfiqar.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Dance Of Death
episode_desc: Srikant discovers that he's been after the wrong suspect all this time.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Paradise
episode_desc: Srikant searches for Sajid at a wedding in Baramulla, against Saloni and Vikram's wishes.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Act Of War
episode_desc: Srikant helps CIA locate Faizan, a wanted man hiding in Balochistan. Srikant slips into Pakistan to interrogate Faizan. Pakistan's Prime Minister finds out about Zulfiqar and tries to stop it.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Fighting Dirty
episode_desc: Srikant tries to thwart a plan to smuggle nerve gas canisters from Kashmir into Delhi.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: The Bomb
episode_desc: TASC realizes that Mission Zulfiqar is not over. There is a Plan B. And it has already been put to action.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Exile
episode_desc: Srikant Tiwari has started a new life as an IT employee, but he can’t stay away from adventure when JK is sent to Chennai to nab a former foreign insurgent. Chennai TASC agent, Muthu and JK are faced with a hostage situation in Chennai. And Dhriti may have a boyfriend.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Weapon
episode_desc: Suchitra wants Srikant to go for couple counselling. Prime Minister Basu wants to make up for India’s recent foreign policy faux pas. Bhaskaran activates an elite unit with Major Sameer’s help. A creep harasses Raji.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Angel of Death
episode_desc: Suchitra's birthday dinner triggers a showdown between Srikant and Suchitra. Srikant quits his IT job and joins back TASC. Raji’s boss is onto her secret life and blackmails her.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Eagle
episode_desc: Srikant starts investigating in Chennai. Sajid teams up with Selva and Raji. Wonder who they are targeting! Inspector Umayal starts investigating Nanda’s disappearance.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Homecoming
episode_desc: Inspector Umayal wants to join the TASC team in their mission. All roads lead to the old base.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Martyrs
episode_desc: Srikant and team manage to nab Raji. But they find out the hard way that they are way in over their heads. TASC suffers a tragic loss.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Collateral Damage
episode_desc: Raji is injured days before the D-Day and needs treatment. Simmering tensions between Suchitra and Dhriti hit a crescendo. Sajid bids adieu to Raji, for he has another, personal mission to accomplish in Mumbai. Meanwhile, Srikant is hit by another debilitating personal crisis.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: Vendetta
episode_desc: The hunt is on for Dhriti. Meanwhile, JK and Muthu decide to check out Tigris Aviation, and walk into a trap. Dhriti’s loss of innocence is gruesome.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.

title: The Final Act
episode_desc: News about JK forces Srikant to rush back to Chennai. Raji hears about Sajid's fate. Dhriti finds out the true nature of Srikant's job. Prime Minister Basu reaches Chennai for bilateral talks with the Lankan President, Rupatunga. Srikant and team race against time to prevent a deadly attack on the two premiers.
show_desc: A working man from the National Investigation Agency tries to protect the nation from terrorism, but he also needs to keep his family safe from his secret job.
